Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Manchester in 1965...
Injured on 8/4/1966 with a Concussion, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/24/1967 with a Bruised Jaw, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1968, off Elly Mae Clampett (NJ)...
Injured on 5/25/1968 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1969, off Jonathan Robinson (SHP)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1969, hitting .438 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New Jersey on 9/19/1969...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 10/2/1969...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New Jersey on 8/16/1970...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against New Jersey on 4/7/1971...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Malibu on 7/4/1971...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Northeastern on 4/15/1972...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Plum Grove on 4/18/1972...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Pittsburgh on 5/6/1972...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Minnesota on 5/10/1974...
Drove in 6 runs against Diablo on 5/30/1974...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1974, hitting .406 with 7 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 1974 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Plum Grove on 7/6/1974...
Won Outstanding Batter Award in 1974, hitting .375 with 21 HR, 116 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1976...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Bay City on 8/22/1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1977, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Wisconsin on 8/25/1977...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1977, hitting .411 with 5 HR, 29 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1978, hitting .419 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1978, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1978, hitting .400 with 7 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/25/1979 with a Fractured Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/13/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $12,500,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 7/26/1980, off Anthony Brim (PON)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1980, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1982, hitting .688 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 4/19/1982 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 7-8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/2/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $4,059,800 per year...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1983, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 18 RBI...
